title: on the train furnished one bedroom heat and h/w available 8/1 or 9/1
posting_body: ['$2200/ 1br - 600ft2 - cozy furnished apartment available 8/1 or 9/1 h/hw and utilities (brighton)', '1BR / 1Ba 600ft', 'cats are OK - purrr', 'Small dogs are case per case basis', 'furnished by owner apartment.', 'There is a possibility to be unfurnished or some small pieces removed.', 'laundry in bldg', 'street parking', 'Sunny, spacious 1 bedroom condo fully FURNISHED, owner maintained apartment with contemporary furnishings, fans and stereo equipment near Brookline line and reservoir.', 'Utilities, cable and internet included, electricity up to $50 are included.', 'Apartment has great floor plan, hardwood floors, and large foyer with arched living room entrance.', 'Apartment has been owner maintained and has an updated stove.', 'There is a coin laundry on the 1st floor of the building and dry cleaning across the street, and fabulous renovated common use roof deck.', 'Kitchen is spacious, has a table and two chairs and has a window.', 'Plenty of light and walking distance to 3 Green train lines.', 'No smoking allowed on the premises.']
